MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the KY14 postcode area of Cupar, this is also affecting the surrounding areas. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers have now arrived on site and in order to complete repairs on faulty overhead equipment at Newhill Cottage, we now need to carry out an emergency shutdown at 6pm. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4.57pm on Friday 19th February 2021.
